entries.text: In the closing years of the Sengoku Era, 時は戦国末期
Japan was consumed by perpetual conflict. 日本すべてを焼いた戦火は
The fires of war raged on, いまだに勢い衰えず
spreading deep into the mountains-- 山深い葦名の国にも
to the land of Ashina. 燃え広がっていた
Lord Genichiro... 弦一郎様…
... Is the war finally over? …戦は、もう終わる
一心様…
(Nngahh! Muahh! Gnnhh!) *different variations
なんと、おそろしい男よ…
葦名には、鬼が棲むか…
国を盗るか、一心よ…
いくぞうっ！
隙ありいっ！
葦名じゃあっ！
田村ぁっ！
これが戦よおっ！
死にくされえっ！
ふむ…、存外に柔首よな…
猛将とて、所詮は血袋か…
葦名に、近付くことなかれ…
General Tamura is no more! 敵将、田村、討ち取ったり！
People of Ashina, we are victorious! 葦名衆よ、この戦、我らの勝利ぞ！
Master swordsman, Isshin Ashina... 剣聖、葦名一心
staged a bloody coup and wrested control of the land. 国盗りの血戦であった
What's the matter, stray? Nothing left to lose? 野良犬が、心すら亡くしたか
Well, would you look at that. ほう
... Fascinating. Will you join me, starving wolf? 共にくるか、飢えた狼よ
Your hunger may beget a fine shinobi. A worthy right hand. お前なら、儂の片腕、よい忍びとなるやもしれぬわ
On that day... そして
a young cub was taken from the battlefield. 戦場で拾われた狼は
He trained relentlessly and indeed-- 修行の末
went on to become a master shinobi. 熟達の忍びとなった
Listen Wolf, you must never forget the Shinobi Code. 忍びの掟は忘れまいな
As your father, my word is absolute. Your master's is a close second. 親の次に大事なもの、お前の心に刻むがよい
As of today, he is your master. あれが、今日からお前の主だ
Defend him with your life. If he is taken, bring him back at any cost. 命を賭して守り、たとえ奪われるとも、必ず取り戻すのだ
You understand me, don't you Wolf... よいな、狼よ…
Is the war... finally over? 戦が、終わるのか…
Lord Isshin... 一心様…
Enemy general, Shuzen Tamura, is slain by my hand! 敵将、田村主膳、討ち取ったり！
